snippet.title: Kobe Bryant
snippet.description: Profiles the life and accomplishments of Los Angeles Lakers basketball guard Kobe Bryant.

snippet.title: Kobe: The Story of the NBA's Rising Young Star Kobe Bryant
snippet.description: Here, for the first time, is the whole story of this incredible athlete--how he became the great person and incredible gifted, driven player he is today.

snippet.title: Kobe Bryant: Champion Basketball Star
snippet.description: "Explores the life of Kobe Bryant, including his childhood, early basketball career, his many individual accomplishments, and his NBA championships with the Los Angeles Lakers"--Provided by publisher.

snippet.title: Kobe Bryant: An Unauthorized Biography - Page 1998
snippet.description: Ultimately, the l7-year-old Bryant made the decision to go directly into the NBA, becoming only the sixth player in NBA history to do so. Bryant's news was met with a lot of publicity at a time when prep to pro NBA players were not very common ...
